description: In Zombie Harvest: Survival Farming Simulator, you step into the boots of a resilient farmer striving to survive in a world overrun by zombies. Manage your farm by growing a variety of crops, raising animals, and mining essential resources to keep your farm thriving. As you expand and fortify your self-sustaining farm, prepare to defend against relentless and unpredictable zombie attacks that test your strategic planning and resource management skills. Build defenses and upgrade your equipment to protect your homestead. Will you thrive and turn your farm into a haven, or will you merely struggle to survive in this thrilling post-apocalyptic farming adventure? The fate of your farm is in your hands. Dive into this immersive blend of farming simulation and survival strategy, and see if you have what it takes to cultivate life in the midst of chaos.
name: Zombie Harvest: Survival Farming Simulator
intro: Grow Your Farm. Survive the Apocalypse. Defend Against the Undead.
